data.title: Five things about Pooja Sharma
data.meta_description: www.myrepublica.com is one of the most comprehensive and up-to-date news portal of nepal in nepali language.
data.text:
Pooja Sharma is one of the highly demanded female actor of K-Town. She debuted in 2012 with ‘3 Lovers’. And later in 2016 she featured as the lead female actor in Sudarshan Thapa directed ‘Madhumas’. She collected further appreciation from the audiences from movies like, ‘Mero Best Friend’ ‘Ajhai Pani’ ‘Ma Yesto Geet Gauchhu’ and ‘Chankhe Shankhe Pankhe’. Though she has done more than half dozen of films, she was highly appreciated for her work in ‘Prem Geet’. Sharma has stepped into producing movies as well. ‘Ramkahani’ is her latest endeavor which was able to collect a gross profit of Rs 3 million. Now Sharma is preparing herself for the shooting of 'Samhalincha Kaile Mann'

In conversation with MyCity’s Aditya Neupane, Sharma revealed five lesser known facts about her that many might not know about her.

Pet lover: Sharma is obsessed with pets. Though she loves all animals, dog is her favorite. She has two years old Cocker Spaniel dog named Romeo. She said, “I like all kind of animals but dogs are my favorite because of their friendly nature and loyalty.”

Travel lover: Sharma loves to travel in natural places. “Traveling in the lap of nature is the best way to rejuvenate our mind from hectic schedules,” said Sharma. Sharma informed that she never misses a chance to go for hiking and trekking. She said, “Traveling in remote area gives me a kind of satisfaction and visiting Rara Lake is on the top of my bucket list.”

Movie Lover: Sharma loves action films. She said, “Now-a-days, love story has become a common genre, so I love action genre.” Adding, “I am so addicted to movies that whenever I am free I can’t stop myself from going for a movie date with my friends and family.” she said ‘Prem Geet’ is her favorite movie till date as she received good appreciation of audiences through the audience.

Foodie: Unlike other celebrities, Sharma doesn’t care about her health when it comes to foods. She eats whatever she sees in front of her. Sharma said, “I can’t control myself when I see any sort of food, no matter whether it is homemade or junk.” Revealing about her strategies to look good she said “I don’t like yoga so I do gym to stay fit and maintain my figure.” She further revealed that that she starts strictly controlling her diet from a month before the shooting begins.
